description: EU leaders are meeting as member Greece is locked in a row with Turkey over energy and sea borders.
title: EU warns Turkey of sanctions over 'provocations' in Mediterranean
title_page: EU warns Turkey of sanctions over 'provocations' in Mediterranean - BBC News
maintext: "But it will only work if the provocations and pressures stop," she said. "We therefore expect that Turkey from now on abstains from unilateral actions. In case of such renewed actions by Ankara, the EU will use all its instruments and options available. We have a toolbox that we can apply immediately."
